author: fitzsimmons
title: I want this site to be a story, tool, and distraction
description: Maybe I'll learn to write or at least have feelings

section.body:
THE ROADBLOCK -could be that being the first post with nothing to show for it, the pressure, self conscious itâ€™s boring and useless

RESURRECTION - make fantastical mockery of the entire post, be funny light hearted.

ELIXIR- still getting drunk and depressed, but move forward anyway?
